SEARCH
Package users

Class User

java.lang.Object
users.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Admin, Employee, Researcher, Student, TechSupportSpecialist
public abstract class User extends Object implements Serializable
The User class represents a generic user in the system.
See Also:

    • logIn

      public boolean logIn(String login, String password, List<User> userList)
      Checks if the provided login and password match those of the user.
      Parameters:
      login - The login to be verified.
      password - The password to be verified.
      userList - The list of users for verification.
      Returns:
      True if the login and password are correct, false otherwise.

    • verify
